name: UFGLadderComponent
comment: Copyright 2016 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

properties.name: mWallDirection
properties.comment: This is the way we are facing when climbing

properties.name: mClimbableLookAngle
properties.comment: Climbable angle in degrees. The player must be looking and moving within this angle relative to the ladder to climb it.

properties.name: mEndClimbingLookAngle
properties.comment: Angle in degrees. If the player must be looking and moving within this angle relative to the ladder or else they will hop off.

properties.name: mPotentialClimbers
properties.comment:
List of players that can potentially climb on the ladder, i.e. within grab distance.
Players that do climb on the ladder is also in this list.
